# Keyed Archiver Root Object Key

**API Collection**

Keys that the archiver uses in the hierarchy of encoded objects.

## Constants

- **NSKeyedArchiveRootObjectKey**: Archives created using the class method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyedArchiver/archivedData(withRootObject:)] use this key for the root object in the hierarchy of encoded objects. The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyedUnarchiver] class method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyedUnarchiver/unarchiveObject(with:)] looks for this root key as well.

## Constants

- **Keyed Archiving Exception Names**: Names of exceptions raised by this class if problems occur while creating an archive.
